alt: a picture of a Fujica ST701 camera from the front
desc: A beautifully preserved Fujica ST701 35mm film camera from the 1970s. Known for its solid metal body and sharp Fujinon lenses, this classic SLR is perfect for collectors or anyone getting into vintage film photography.
title: FUJICA ST701 Camera

alt: three different bolts for classic Japanese cars
desc: A 25-pack of authentic reproduction bolts designed for vintage Japanese vehicles. Ideal for restorations or repairs, each bolt matches original JDM specs for fit and finish.
title: 25-Pack Bolts for Classic Japanese Cars

alt: a vintage Fernandes V-7 Art Wave electric guitar
desc: A rare Fernandes V-7 ‘Art Wave’ guitar, made in Japan circa 1980. Features distinctive offset styling, dual P-90 pickups, and bold Art Wave graphics — a standout piece for collectors and players alike.
title: Fernandes V-7 Art Wave Guitar

alt: a pink and red kimono with butterfly and flower motifs
desc: A handcrafted kimono inspired by traditional Yukata design. Decorated with delicate butterfly and floral patterns in shades of pink and red — elegant, lightweight, and made for comfort and style.
title: Custom Kimono / Yukata
